DOC.brief_summary: Many metabolic complications of obesity are a consequence of abnormal responses of the liver, muscle, and fat to insulin actions. Fenretinide may improve the effects of insulin, preventing metabolic complications.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized, Double-blind Study of the Effects of Fenretinide Administered in Subjects With Obesity
DOC.criteria: BMI >30 Diabetes Requiring Medication Poorly Controlled CoMorbidities
